Headline: ඕස්ට්‍රෙලියා දරුවො ක්‍රිකට් ගහද්දි ලංකාවෙ දරුවො පාර්ලිමේන්තුවේ (සිකුරාදා කාටූන්)

comments.comment: why is this "gon" cartoon? Forces are responsible whole country. Is their any special? North is a part of Sri Lanka. Sri Lankan is one nation.
so why do tamil politicians ask forces to evacuate from north and east,

Yes. Forces have a responsibility to react when the community is in trouble. Not only forces, but we all should stand together when country is in a disaster rather than commenting that it is the responsibility of someone else. Unfortunately we are a nation who don't respect anyone. We need forces when we are in trouble.
